name: cwbot
short_description:
cwbot is an extensible chatbot for the Kingdom of Loathing, designed to be easy to set up and simple to extend.

IMPORTANT UPDATE INFORMATION: 

Version 0.13.0 incorporates various updates. Internet traffic should be much faster due to the requests library. MAKE SURE TO RUN "pip install -r requirements.txt" after installing.

It is now recommended to set the FaxModule's "announce" option to false. Also, a new upstart script in /documentation should be used to replace the old one.

Version 0.12 added the WalkieTalkieRepeater and Dreadsylvania support! See readme.txt.

For full documentation, see the readme.txt file in the /doc folder. For developers, see developers.txt in the same folder.

NOTE: cwbot is in beta. Interfaces are subject to change.
